STATE v. THOMAS No. COA04-1643. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed October 18, 2005. Certification Date November 7, 2005. Appeal from Guilford (03CRS95102, 03CRS95103, 03CRS95104, 03CRS95105, 03CRS95109, 03CRS95110, 03CRS95113).

Case reported without published opinion. New Trial.
